InputColumns.Name: number of name server delegations used
number of days over 90% cpu utilization
estimated on-demand cost post recommended ri purchase (monthly)
recommended number of ris to purchase
estimated on-demand cost post recommended reserved instance purchase (monthly)
estimated on-demand cost post recommended reserved nodes purchase (monthly)
recommended number of reserved instances to purchase
recommended number of reserved nodes to purchase
date of max daily timeout rate
number of questions answered for performance
number of hris resolved for performance
total number of questions in performance pillar
number of identified hris for performance
number of hris resolved for reliability
total number of questions in reliability pillar
number of questions answered for reliability
number of identified hris for reliability
number of hris resolved for security
total number of questions in security pillar
number of questions answered for security
number of identified hris for security
number of hris resolved for cost optimization
total number of questions in cost optimization pillar
number of questions answered for cost optimization
number of identified hris for cost optimization

Columns.Expression:
ifelse(
    accountname = '' OR isNull(accountname),
    accountid,
    concat(accountname,': ',accountid)
    )

ifelse(
{Check Name} = 'Idle Load Balancers', {load balancer name},
{Check Name} = 'Amazon RDS Idle DB Instances', {db instance name},
{Check Name} = 'Low Utilization Amazon EC2 Instances', {instance id},
{Check Name} = 'Unassociated Elastic IP Addresses', {ip address},
{Check Name} = 'Underutilized Amazon EBS Volumes', {volume id},
{Check Name} = 'Underutilized Amazon Redshift Clusters', cluster,
{Check Name} = 'Amazon EBS Public Snapshots', {volume id},
{Check Name} = 'Amazon RDS Public Snapshots', {db instance or cluster id},
{Check Name} = 'AWS Lambda Functions with High Error Rates', {function arn},
{Check Name} = 'AWS Lambda Functions Using Deprecated Runtimes', {function arn},
checkid = 'Wxdfp4B1L1' OR checkid = 'Wxdfp4B1L2' OR checkid = 'Wxdfp4B1L3' OR checkid = 'Wxdfp4B1L4',{workload arn},
{Resource Id}
)

ifelse(
category = 'Cost Optimizing',
maxOver(Datetime, [{Resource Id},{instance type}],PRE_AGG),
{Check Name} = 'Amazon EBS Snapshots',
maxOver(Datetime, [{volume id},{Account},{snapshot age},{volume attachment}],PRE_AGG),
{Check Name} = 'Amazon EC2 Availability Zone Balance',
maxOver(Datetime, [{Account},{region}, {instances in zone a},{instances in zone b},{instances in zone c},{instances in zone d},{instances in zone e},{instances in zone f}],PRE_AGG),

maxOver(Datetime, [{Resource Id}],PRE_AGG)
)

Columns.ColumnName: Last Check for Account and CheckId

Columns.Expression: ifelse(dateDiff({Last Check for Resource},{Last Check for Account and CheckId}) >= 8, 'no', 'yes')

ifelse(
{checkname} = 'Idle Load Balancers', parseDecimal(replace(replace({estimated monthly savings},'$',''),',','')),
{checkname} = 'Amazon RDS Idle DB Instances', parseDecimal(replace(replace({estimated monthly savings (on demand)},'$',''),',','')),
{checkname} = 'Low Utilization Amazon EC2 Instances', parseDecimal(replace(replace({estimated monthly savings},'$',''),',','')),
{checkname} = 'Underutilized Amazon EBS Volumes', parseDecimal(replace(replace({monthly storage cost},'$',''),',','')),
{checkname} = 'Underutilized Amazon Redshift Clusters', parseDecimal(replace(replace({estimated monthly savings},'$',''),',','')),
{checkname} = 'AWS Lambda Functions with High Error Rates',parseDecimal(replace(replace({lost daily compute cost},'$',''),',',''))*30,
null
)

ifelse(
    category = 'cost_optimizing',
    'Cost Optimizing',
    category = 'fault_tolerance',
    'Fault Tolerance',
    category = 'security',
    'Security',
    category = 'performance',
    'Performance',
    category = 'service_limits',
    'Service Limits',
    category
)
maxOver(parseInt(replace({number of days low utilization}, ' days','')), [{Resource Id}],PRE_AGG)
maxOver(parseDate({date for max error rate},'MM/dd/yyyy'),[{Resource Id}],PRE_AGG)

Columns.ColumnName: Number of Days Over 90% Cpu Utilization
Columns.Expression: maxOver(parseInt({number of days over 90% cpu utilization}), [{instance name}],PRE_AGG)
maxOver(parseDecimal({ratio of transfer to storage}),[{bucket name}],PRE_AGG)

Columns.ColumnName: DateTime is Last Check for Resource

Columns.Expression: ifelse( maxOver(Datetime, [{Resource Id}] , PRE_AGG) = Datetime, {Estimated Monthly Savings Numeric}, null)
ifelse( maxOver(Datetime, [resourceid,extract('MM', Datetime),extract('YYYY', Datetime)] , PRE_AGG) = Datetime, {Estimated Monthly Savings Numeric}, null)
